info.title: FUB to GHL service
info.description: API for managing leads, updating tags, and handling tasks.

post.summary: Create a new lead or add a new inquiry note
post.description: Creates a lead in the GHL system. If it already exists, adds an inquiry note

200.description: User was not created, but an inquiry note was added

message.example: User was not created, already exists. Added inquiry note if provided

406.description: Validation error in the request payload

message.example: Validation error {'person': ['Missing data for required field.']}

400.description: General error occurred while creating lead

put.description: Updates lead details using the lead ID.

406.description: Validation error in the request payload

message.example: Validation error {'person': ['Missing data for required field.']}

400.description: General error occurred while updating lead

delete.description: Delete lead details using the lead ID.

400.description: General error occurred while deleting lead

202.description: Lead was not found by this email

message.example: Something went wrong, followers weren't added

406.description: Validation error in the request payload

message.example: Validation error {'followers': ['Missing data for required field.']}

400.description: General error occurred while adding followers

post.description: Retrieves a lead data based on email.

202.description: Lead was not found by this email

message.example: There is no such contact with email = john@doe.com

406.description: Validation error in the request payload

message.example: Validation error {'person': ['Missing data for required field.']}

400.description: General error occurred while getting lead by email

get.description: Retrieves a lead data based on id.

202.description: Lead was not found by this id

message.example: There is no such contact with id = 123

400.description: General error occurred while getting lead by id

message.example: Error while getting lead by id 'error'

post.description: Retrieves lead data based on email.

202.description: User was not found by this email

message.example: There is no such user with email = John@doe.com

400.description: General error occurred while getting lead by id

message.example: Error while getting user by email 'error'

406.description: Validation error in the request payload

message.example: Validation error {'email': ['Missing data for required field.']}

get.description: Retrieves lead data based on id.

202.description: User was not found by this id

message.example: There is no such user with id = 123

400.description: General error occurred while getting user by id

message.example: Error while getting user by id 'error'

202.description: User was not found by this email

message.example: There is no users currently in this location

400.description: General error occurred while getting lead by id

message.example: Error while getting a users list 'error'

patch.description: Adds tags to an existing lead.

parameters.name: lead_id
parameters.description: ID of the lead to update

400.description: General error occurred while adding tags

406.description: Validation error in the request payload

message.example: Validation error {'tags': ['Missing data for required field.']}

post.description: Creates a new task based on lead_id in URL.

parameters.name: lead_id
parameters.description: ID of the lead to update

400.description: General error occurred while creating task

406.description: Validation error in the request payload

message.example: Validation error {'dueDate': ['Missing data for required field.']}

post.description: Creates a new task for a specific lead based on lead_id in URL.

parameters.name: lead_id
parameters.description: ID of the lead to associate the task with

body.example:
Property Inquiry
https://www.findbusinesses4sale.com/listing/.../
MLS#123456

via: FB4S

Please provide me with more information about this business.

Laundromats at BOUNDARY in Vancouver, British Columbia, Price: $198,000, Date: 2025-03-01 18:08:47

400.description: General error occurred while adding note

406.description: Validation error in the request payload

message.example: Validation error {'property': ['Missing data for required field.']}
